name: New Sandbox Sim\\RPG Video Game Project
blurb: An AWESOME videogame where you can do about anything. It's an RPG and a Sim and I believe it will be a BIG hit! XD

rewards.reward: 1) You will be credited in the game as a supporter.\r\n2) You will receive a Copper Certificate ($10-$14) for the game.

2) You will receive a Copper Star Certificate (Free Copy and 3 Free Gift Copies) for the game.
